content.query:
USE updatawarehouse
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

--Transacional con particion
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.base02(
    UPC VARCHAR(8000),
    SKU VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/base.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- STOCK
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.stock(
    COD_REF VARCHAR(8000),
    STOCK_CONTABLE VARCHAR(8000),
    PREC_UNITARIO VARCHAR(8000),
    PU_CONTABLE VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/stock.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- UNIDADES
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.unidades(
    COD_REF VARCHAR(8000),
    UPC VARCHAR(8000),
    SKU VARCHAR(8000),
    DESCRIPCION_LARGA VARCHAR(8000),
    SUBCLASE-CONJUNTO VARCHAR(8000),
    DESC_SUBCLASE-DESC_CONJUNTO VARCHAR(8000),
    MARCA VARCHAR(8000),
    MODELO VARCHAR(8000),
    NRO_LOCAL VARCHAR(8000),
    LOCAL VARCHAR(8000),
    Unidades VARCHAR(8000),
    Fecha DATE
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/unidades.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- PRECIO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.precio(
    COD_REF VARCHAR(8000),
    PREC_UNITARIO VARCHAR(8000)
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/precio.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.base02(
    COD_REF VARCHAR(8000),
    UPC VARCHAR(8000),
    SKU VARCHAR(8000),
    DESCRIPCION_LARGA ,
    SUBCLASE-CONJUNTO ,
    DESC_SUBCLASE-DESC_CONJUNTO ,
    
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/raw/raw_lab02/base.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
);
GO




SELECT * FROM business.precio
